title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-2.1 - Number of copies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-2.1 - Number of copies

State Regulations
(a) Public
utilities shall file a copy of all schedules, amendments, statements, supplements, and addenda. (b) All
schedules, amendments, supplements, statements and addenda, shall be
accompanied by a letter of transmittal using a format specified in the

Department of Public Service's Electronic Tariff System: Utility Preparer's

Guide (See Appendix 7-H of this Title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
720-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
